title: 150+ Catchy Coffee Quotes and One-Liners to Start Your Day

steps.title: Read funny coffee sayings to start the day with laughter.
steps.content: Read funny coffee sayings to start the day with laughter. Nothing grounds you quicker than a laugh. While youâ€™re waiting for your perfect cup to brew , perk up with a hilarious coffee saying, joke, or quote thatâ€™s sure to bring a smile to your face. [1] X Research source â€œWhat goes best with a cup of coffee? Another cup.â€ â€“ Henry Rollins â€œI believe humans get a lot done, not because weâ€™re smart, but because we have thumbs so we can make coffee.â€ â€“ Flash Rosenberg â€œIâ€™d rather take coffee than compliments just now.â€ â€“ Louisa May Alcott, Little Women â€œWhy, yes, I could start my day without coffee. But I like being able to remember things like how to say words and put on pants.â€ â€“ Nanea Hoffman, Sweatpants & Coffee â€œEveryone should believe in something. I believe I will have another coffee.â€ â€“ Groucho Marx â€œIt is inhumane, in my opinion, to force people who have a genuine medical need for coffee to wait in line behind people who apparently view it as some kind of recreational activity.â€ â€“ Dave Barry â€œDo you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?â€ â€“ Jean Kerr â€œThere is no life without water, because water is needed to make coffee.â€ â€œNo matter what historians claimed, BC really stood for â€˜Before Coffee.â€™â€ â€“ Cherise Sinclair, Master of the Mountains â€œIf it werenâ€™t for coffee, Iâ€™d have no identifiable personality whatsoever.â€ â€“ David Letterman â€œStarbucks says theyâ€™re going to start putting religious quotes on cups. The very first one will say, â€˜Jesus! This cup is expensive!â€™â€ â€“ Conan Oâ€™Brien â€œDrink coffee! Do stupid things faster with more energy.â€ â€œWe want to do a lot of stuff; weâ€™re not in great shape; we didnâ€™t get a good nightâ€™s sleep; weâ€™re a little depressed. Coffee solves all these problems in one delightful little cup.â€ â€“ Jerry Seinfeld â€œIâ€™ll quit coffee. It wonâ€™t be easy drinking my Baileyâ€™s straight, but Iâ€™ll get used to it. Itâ€™ll still be the best part of waking up.â€ â€“ Megan Mullally â€œLife without coffee is like something without something. Sorry, I havenâ€™t had any coffee yet.â€ â€œI donâ€™t drink coffee to wake up. I wake up to drink coffee.â€ â€œMy coffee machine is the most beautiful person in the world to me.â€ â€œI never drink coffee at lunch. I find it keeps me awake for the afternoon.â€ â€“ Ronald Reagan â€œThe most dangerous drinking game is seeing how long I can go without coffee.â€ â€œWithout my morning coffee, Iâ€™m just like a dried-up piece of goat.â€ â€“ J.S. Bach â€œDecaf coffee only works if you throw it at people.â€ â€œBehind every successful woman is a substantial amount of coffee.â€ â€“ Stephanie Piro â€œTo make me happy: Make me coffee, bring me coffee, be coffeeâ€¦ coffee.â€ â€œItâ€™s strange how drinking 8 cups of water seems impossible, but 8 cups of coffee go down like a chubby kid on a see-saw.â€ â€œSometimes I go hours without drinking coffee. Itâ€™s called sleeping.â€ â€œI donâ€™t have a problem with caffeine. I have a problem without it.â€

steps.title: Share a hilarious one-liner with your fellow coffee lovers.
steps.content: Share a hilarious one-liner with your fellow coffee lovers. Indulge in a quick coffee quip that gets right to the point like a shot of espresso. Text one of these quotes to your friends and family who you love a latte , or share it on Facebook or Instagram. [2] X Research source â€œCoffee first. Schemes later.â€ â€“ Leanna Renee Hieber, Darker Still â€œEven bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.â€ â€“ David Lynch â€œI never laugh until Iâ€™ve had my coffee.â€ â€“ Clark Gable â€œKeep calm and make coffee.â€ â€œCoffee is my survival juice.â€ â€œForever: the time it takes to brew the first cup of coffee in the morning.â€ â€œDecaf isnâ€™t in my vocabulary.â€ â€œGive me coffee or give me chaos.â€ â€œWho needs a motivational quote when you have coffee?â€ â€œLife happens, but coffee helps.â€ â€œBehind every productive workday is a lot of coffee.â€ â€œCoffee is the real employee of the month.â€ â€œCoffee: turning panic into productivity since forever.â€ â€œCoffee is my water now.â€ â€“ Becky G â€œCoffee is a beverage that puts one to sleep when not drank.â€ â€“ Alphonse Allais â€œI canâ€™t imagine a day without coffee. I canâ€™t imagine!â€ â€“ Howard Schultz â€œI get a couple cups of coffee into me and weird things just start to happen.â€ â€“ Gary Larson â€œCoffee in England is just toasted milk.â€ â€“ Christopher Fry â€œOur culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second.â€ â€“ Edward Abbey â€œIf this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.â€ â€“ A distinguished citizen of North Carolina [3] X Research source â€œMay your coffee be strong and your Monday be short.â€ â€œTodayâ€™s good mood is brought to you by coffee.â€ â€œDonâ€™t trust anything I said before I had my coffee.â€ â€œWhy did the hipster burn his tongue? He drank his coffee before it was cool.â€ â€œI like coffee because it gives me the illusion that I might be awake.â€ â€“ Lewis Black â€œ7 days without coffee makes one weak.â€ â€œMy birthstone is a coffee bean.â€

steps.title: Memorize a clever or sarcastic coffee saying to impress your friends.
steps.content: Memorize a clever or sarcastic coffee saying to impress your friends. Comedians and quick-witted individuals have blessed the world with their musings on coffee. Check out the best of these wisecracks belowâ€”their bitter tone is perfect for when you havenâ€™t had your cup yet. â€œDoctors found traces of blood in my coffee stream.â€ â€œBefore 10 am, no matter what the question is, my answer is always coffee.â€ â€œCoffee helps me maintain my â€˜never killed anyoneâ€™ streak.â€ â€œI like my coffee like I like myself: strong, sweet, and too hot for you.â€ â€“ Jac Vanek â€œQuick, drink coffee and pretend you know what youâ€™re doing.â€ â€œI have measured out my life with coffee spoons.â€ â€“ T.S. Eliot, "The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock" â€œI put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.â€ â€“ Steven Wright â€œWhen life gives you lemons, trade them for coffee.â€ â€œOnce you wake up and smell the coffee, itâ€™s hard to go back to sleep.â€ â€“ Fran Drescher â€œThe powers of a manâ€™s mind are directly proportional to the quantity of coffee he drank.â€ â€“ Sir James Mackintosh â€œPeople say money canâ€™t buy happiness. Thatâ€™s a lie. Money buys coffee, and coffee makes me happy!â€ â€œGiven enough coffee, I could rule the world.â€ â€œCoffee is a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your older self.â€ â€“ Terry Pratchett â€œI would rather suffer with coffee than be senseless.â€ â€“ Napoleon Bonaparte â€œHumanity runs on coffee.â€ â€œWant to hear a joke? Decaf.â€ â€œIf youâ€™re not coffee, chocolate, or bacon, Iâ€™m going to need you to go away.â€ â€œA mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.â€ â€“ Alfred RÃ©nyi â€œScience may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.â€ â€“ Earl Wilson â€œWhat do you want?â€ â€œJust coffee. Black â€“ like my soul.â€ â€“ Cassandra Clare, City of Bones â€œIs there anything better than iced coffee and a bookstore on a sunny day? I mean, aside from hot coffee and a bookstore on a rainy day.â€ â€“ Emily Henry, Book Lovers â€œThey like their coffee like they like their ex-boyfriends: bitter.â€ â€“ John Green, An Abundance of Katherines â€œI donâ€™t really like coffee, she said, but I donâ€™t really like it when my head hits my desk when I fall asleep either.â€ â€“ Brian Andreas â€œOnly Irish coffee provides in a single glass all four essential food groups: alcohol, caffeine, sugar, and fat.â€ â€“ Alex Levine â€œOnly an idiot would rely on the energy of a bean or a leaf to stay awake throughout the day.â€ â€“ Tahereh Mafi, Destroy Me

steps.title: Contemplate simple pleasures like coffee with a meaningful quote.
steps.content: Contemplate simple pleasures like coffee with a meaningful quote. Not every saying about coffee is as bitter as a burnt roast. Some capture the joy coffee brings as part of a morning routine. Show your appreciation for a satisfying cappuccino by sharing one of these beautiful quotes on social media or over text. [4] X Research source â€œI orchestrate my mornings to the tune of coffee.â€ â€“ Harry Mahtar â€œCoffee is a balm for the heart and spirit.â€ â€“ Giuseppe Verdi â€œCoffee should be black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.â€ â€“ Charles Maurice de Talleyrand-PÃ©rigord â€œLife is just one cup of coffee after another, and donâ€™t look for anything else.â€ â€“ Bertrand Russell â€œIâ€™d never met coffee that wasnâ€™t wonderful. It was just a matter of how wonderful it was.â€ â€“ Laurell K. Hamilton â€œTo me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions.â€ â€“ Hugh Jackman â€œCoffee is a language in itself.â€ â€“ Jackie Chan â€œAh, coffee. The sweet balm by which we shall accomplish todayâ€™s task.â€ â€“ Holly Black, Ironside â€œWhat on Earth could be more luxurious than a sofa, a book, and a cup of coffee?â€ â€“ Anthony Trollope â€œCoffee, the favorite drink of the civilized world.â€ â€“ Thomas Jefferson â€œAs long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?â€ â€“ Cassandra Clare, City of Ashes â€œGood communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after.â€ â€“ Anne Morrow Lindbergh, Gift from the Sea â€œItâ€™s amazing how the world begins to change through the eyes of a cup of coffee.â€ â€“ Donna A. Favors â€œNo one can understand the truth until he drinks of coffeeâ€™s frothy goodness.â€ â€“ Sheik Abd-al-Kadir â€œI like my coffee with cream and my literature with optimism.â€ â€“ Abigail Reynolds â€œIt doesnâ€™t matter where youâ€™re from or how you feelâ€¦ Thereâ€™s always peace in a strong cup of coffee.â€ â€“ Gabriel BÃ¡, Daytripper â€œCoffee connects us in so many waysâ€”to each other, to our senses, and to the earth that supports the coffee trees.â€ â€“ Rohan Marley â€œCoffee smells like freshly ground heaven.â€ â€“ Jessi Lane Adams â€œHe was my cream, and I was his coffee. And when you poured us together, it was something.â€ â€“ Josephine Baker â€œWe are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. The trick is, knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out.â€ â€“ Ray Bradbury [5] X Research source â€œCoffee, which makes the politician wise, and see through all things with his half-shut eyes.â€ â€“ Alexander Pope â€œConscience keeps more people awake than coffee.â€ â€œCoffee makes us severe, and grave and philosophical.â€ â€“ Jonathan Swift â€œCoffee is the elixir that awakens the mind, an aromatic kiss that caresses the soul.â€ â€œActually, this seems to be the basic need of the human heart in nearly every great crisisâ€”a good hot cup of coffee.â€ â€“ Alexander King [6] X Research source

steps.title: Caption your coffee pictures with the perfect pun or quote.
steps.content: Caption your coffee pictures with the perfect pun or quote. When you share an aesthetically pleasing snapshot of your morning brew, top it off with just the right caption . Use a cute coffee pun or a reflective quote to engage followers with your caffeinated content. [7] X Research source Look what you made me brew! Iâ€™m a latte to handle â˜• Frappe birthday! Trouble is brewing ğŸ˜ˆ Espresso Patronum! ğŸ§™â˜• Deja brew: the feeling youâ€™ve had this coffee before ğŸ‘€ Itâ€™s brew or die Thatâ€™s that me espresso â˜• Ex-presso yourself Rise and grind Iâ€™m livinâ€™ la vida mocha ğŸ« My cup runneth over â€œA bad day with coffee is better than a good day without it.â€ Maybe sheâ€™s born with it, maybe itâ€™s caffeine ğŸ˜… But first, coffee Sip happens Coffee: because adulting is hard ğŸ˜“ Meet my hot friend Coffee is a hug in a mug â˜• Life begins after Iâ€™ve had my coffee â€œNot all who wander are lost. Some are just looking for coffee.â€ Have a brew-tiful day! ğŸ˜Š More espresso, less depresso Inhale caffeine, exhale negativity Support your local caffeine dealers! Coffee and friends are the perfect blend Just brew it

steps.title: Relate to fellow caffeine lovers with a quote celebrating coffee.
steps.content: Relate to fellow caffeine lovers with a quote celebrating coffee. If you love coffee, itâ€™s not hard to find a community of like-minded people. Deciding which is the best way to take your coffee is another story. Regardless of which latte you like, find common ground(s) when you share one of these quotes with other coffee lovers. â€œI gave up coffee. Itâ€™s almost worse than giving up a lover.â€ â€“ Sandra Bullock â€œI think if I were a woman Iâ€™d wear coffee as perfume.â€ â€“ John Van Druten â€œA cup of coffee shared with a friend is happiness tasted and time well spent.â€ â€œCoffee is my love language.â€ â€œCoffee lovers have no regretsâ€”only refills.â€ â€œIâ€™m half human, half coffee.â€ â€œThis coffee tastes like I should stay home from work and binge-watch Netflix from my bed.â€ â€œCoffee isnâ€™t a drug. Itâ€™s a vitamin.â€ â€œDon't ever let anyone tell you that fairy tales arenâ€™t real. I drink a potion made from magic beans every day, and it brings me back to life.â€ â€“ Nanea Hoffman, Sweatpants & Coffee â€œCoffee is the most important meal of the day.â€ â€œE = MC2. Energy = My Coffee times 2.â€ â€œAsking me if I like coffee is like asking me if I like breathing.â€ â€œI just realized Iâ€™m not a morning person. Iâ€™m a coffee person.â€ â€œFirst I drink the coffee, then I do the things.â€ â€œIâ€™d stop drinking coffee, but Iâ€™m not a quitter.â€ â€œAll you need is loveâ€”or more coffee.â€ â€œCoffee is my liquid patience.â€ â€œLove is in the airâ€”I can smell my coffee brewing.â€ â€œCoffee: an attitude adjustment in a mug.â€ â€œI love people who make me laugh, make me think, and make me coffee. Not necessarily in that order.â€ â€œThe problem with coffee is trying to make it when you havenâ€™t had any yet.â€ â€œI like my coffee how I like my Death Stars: gigantic, on the dark side, and powerful enough to destroy a planet.â€ â€œA yawn is a silent scream for coffee.â€ â€œEvery day is like a cup of coffee: it will be as good as you make it.â€
